imdb.title: Viper's Creed
imdb.plot: By the mid 21st century the world has been devastated by environmental pollution and world war. Failed attempts to repair the environmental damage have made travel by air and sea impossible. With 35% of land now underwater isolate...

episodes.title: Cyclops
episodes.plot: AGS Blademen were deployed to pursue a Megasoma Bugmech en route to Daiva City

episodes.title: Shinpei -Unknown
episodes.plot: Haruki Oguma, the only son of AGS President Fuyuhiko Oguma, is selected to be an AQS Blademan operative despite his father's wishes for him not do so.

episodes.title: Shot
episodes.plot: Saiki gets blamed for the killing of a local man after he had fired on the Blademan in an anti-Bugmech operation that resulted in civilian casualties.

episodes.title: Sorceress
episodes.plot: After a young elementary school student was kidnapped from a monorail by an unknown man, Norma works alone to provide ransom money to save her from her captors.

episodes.title: Grim Reaper
episodes.plot: Police arrest Rudra for being the main suspect responsible for the assassination of a public official by using a sniper rifle-armed Maneuver-Blade mecha despite him being present with the other AGS personnel during an anti-terrorist operation.

episodes.title: Golem
episodes.plot: When Haruki invites Saiki, Kariya and Gharib to eat with him in a local Asian ethnic restaurant for dinner, the four AGS personnel find out that the owner is subjected to a huge debt.

episodes.title: Riot
episodes.plot: An anti-AGS riot turns sour when Rudra threatened to use force to settle it after a bombing incident was credited to Hounds, a group of supposedly anti-PMC terrorists.

episodes.title: Eden
episodes.plot: Theresia Strauss, AGS official, suggests to Fuyuhiko Oguma that Haruki was the most likely culprit for yesterday's failed mission.

episodes.title: Intrigue
episodes.plot: AGS goes out to the public by using Haruki's death to further propagate anti-Hound operations and to promote AGS, deploying the Viper unit to a Hound safehouse before the military intervenes to arrest them instead.

episodes.title: Counterattack
episodes.plot: Ulla Chiaki, the leader of the Hound, appears on national television and accuses the Vipers of killing his fellow members.

episodes.title: Truth
episodes.plot: Theresia and the renegade military faction were able to seize control of AGS with help from Ulla, who had been assisting them all along from the shadows.

episodes.title: Blindness
episodes.plot: Saiki faces off against Ulla in his custom Maneuver-Blade prototype before he was severely wounded to the point that he was blinded.
